original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.2. Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
analyzed: kusala ttika sa hetuka duka

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetuko ca na akusalaḥ na sa hetuko

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko
analyzed: na akusalam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetuko ca na akusalaḥ na sa hetuko

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na abyākatam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naabyākataṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukañca na abyākatam na sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naakusalaṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na sa hetukam ca na akusalam na sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate pannarasa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pannarasa ārammaṇe nava pe adhipatiyā nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate pannarasa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naabyākataṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākatam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam ca na abyākatam na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalam na ahetukam ca na abyākatam na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naakusalaṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam ca na akusalam na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa sabbattha vitthāro
